00019 #include <iostream>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/property_tree/xml_parser.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include "FFTProcessor.hpp"
00025 #include "demod_fsk_processor.hpp"
00026 #include "demod_msk_processor.hpp"
00027 #include "network.hpp"
00028 #include "network/broadcaster.hpp"
00029 #include "network/iq_adapter.hpp"
00030 #include "network/multi_client.hpp"
00031 #include "processor/registry.hpp"
00032 #include "run.hpp"
00033 #include "wave/writer.hpp"
00034 #include "writer.hpp"
00035 #include "station_info.hpp"
00036 
00047 namespace network {
00048   namespace client {
00050     class multi_client_to_broadcaster : public multi_client {
00051     public:
00052       typedef boost::property_tree::ptree ptree;
00053       multi_client_to_broadcaster(const ptree& config)
00054         : multi_client(config)
00055         , broadcaster_(broadcaster::broadcaster::make(config.get_child("Broadcaster")))
00056         , started_(false)
00057         , station_info_(config.get<std::string>("StationInfo")) {}
00058 
00059       virtual ~multi_client_to_broadcaster() {}
00060 
00061     protected:
00062       virtual processor::result_base::sptr dump(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00063         //     LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("multi_client_to_broadcaster::dump: %s %s") % rp->name() % rp->to_string()));
00064         if (not started_) {
00065           broadcaster_->start();
00066           started_= true;
00067         }
00068 
00069         std::ostringstream oss_header;
00070         oss_header << station_info_;
00071         rp->dump_header(oss_header);
00072         std::string header_str(oss_header.str());
00073 
00074         std::ostringstream oss_data;
00075         rp->dump_data(oss_data);
00076         std::string data_str(oss_data.str());
00077     
00078         broadcaster_->bc_data(rp->approx_ptime(), rp->name(), rp->format(), data_str, header_str);
00079         return rp;
00080       }
00081 
00082       virtual void dump_wav(processor::service_base::ptime t, std::string str_name,
00083                             data_buffer_type::const_iterator begin,
00084                             data_buffer_type::const_iterator end) {
00085         std::string data(begin, end);
00086         broadcaster_->bc_data(t, str_name, "WAV_0000", data);
00087       }
00088 
00089     private:
00090       broadcaster::broadcaster::sptr broadcaster_;
00091       bool         started_;
00092       station_info station_info_;
00093     } ;
00094 
00095   } // namespace client
00096 } // namespace network
00097 
00098 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00099 {
00100   boost::program_options::variables_map vm;
00101   try {
00102     vm = process_options("config/multi_client.xml", argc, argv);
00103   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00104     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00105     return 1;
00106   }
00107 
00108   boost::filesystem::path p(vm["config"].as<std::string>());
00109   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", p.stem().native());
00110   try {
00111     typedef boost::property_tree::ptree ptree;
00112     ptree config;
00113     read_xml(vm["config"].as<std::string>(), config, boost::property_tree::xml_parser::no_comments);
00114     const ptree& config_multi_client(config.get_child("MultiClient"));
00115 
00116     // fill spm (stream name -> processor name) multimap
00117     network::client::multi_client::stream_processor_map spm;
00118     BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type& s,
00119                   config_multi_client.get_child("Streams")) {
00120       if (s.first != "Stream") {
00121         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("ignoring invalid key: '%s'") % s.first));
00122         continue;
00123       }
00124       spm.insert(std::make_pair(s.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.pattern"), s.second.get<std::string>("")));
00125     }
00126 
00127     processor::registry::add<writer_txt>("WriterTXT");
00128     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<wave::writer_iq>     >("WriterIQ");
00129     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<float > > >("FFTProcessor_FLOAT");
00130     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<double> > >("FFTProcessor_DOUBLE");
00131     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<demod_msk_processor  > >("DemodMSK");
00132     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<demod_fsk_processor  > >("DemodFSK");
00133 
00134     network::client::multi_client_to_broadcaster c(config_multi_client);
00135 
00136     const std::set<std::string> streams(c.ls());
00137     BOOST_FOREACH(std::string stream, streams)
00138       std::cout << "-- " << stream << std::endl;
00139 
00140     ASSERT_THROW(c.connect_to(spm) == true);
00141 
00142     c.start();
00143     run_in_thread(network::get_io_service());
00144   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00145     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00146     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00147     return 1;
00148   }
00149   return 0;
00150 }
